dt: {bc}a supernatural being in Persian folklore descended from fallen angels and excluded from paradise until penance is accomplished

et: Persian {it}perī{/it} fairy, genius, from Middle Persian {it}parīk{/it}; akin to Avestan {it}pairikā{/it} sorceress
shortdef: a supernatural being in Persian folklore descended from fallen angels and excluded from paradise until penance is accomplished
